HiddenText.Name: Can the application for online programs be filled out online?
HiddenText.OpenningText: Can the application for online programs be filled out online?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: For online degree seeking students, YES, you can fill out the application online at www.besmart.com. Â For Pathway (Academic Start) Students, the application is downloaded, completed, and turned in to the missionaries overseeing your Pathway site.
